description: It is no Simple Life keeping up a slim physique like the former reality star. The makeup-free 35-year-old flaunted her endless pins after an intense workout at a LA gym.
title: Nicole Richie dabs face with a towel after workout in LA
title_page: Nicole Richie dabs face with a towel after workout in LA | Daily Mail Online
text:
It is no Simple Life keeping up a slim physique like Nicole Richie!
And the makeup-free 35-year-old, who first came into the spotlight as Paris Hilton's wild best friend, opted for a natural look as she left a gym in LA, California, US.
Nicole Richie showed off her endless pins in black skintight leggings after the intense workout.
Scroll down for video
The leggy look: Makeup-free Nicole Richie dabbed her face with a towel as she showed off her endless pins in black skintight leggings at an LA gym in California
Naked! The style guru opted for a natural look as she went makeup-free for the gym session
But the reality star turned designer masked the rest of her slender frame with a baggy dark grey hoodie.
She also tackled the vigorous workout in a pair of Nike trainers.
The fresh-faced celeb pulled her sun kissed-tipped tresses off her face in a slick ponytail.
It is no secret she puts hard work into keeping up her slim figure as she wiped the sweat from her face with a white cloth.
Working up a sweat! It is no doubt the reality star turned designer pulled out all the stops on an intense work out as she was spotted leaving the gym wiping her face with a white towel
But she didn't let the session wear her out as Nicole is keen to pull out all the stops on staying in shape.
And now the former reality TV babe has landed her first acting role.
The on-trend designer is set to return to our screens as she stars in comedy series Great News.
Keeping in shape! The new comedy show the former reality TV babe stars in will air April 25 on NBC
The exciting move follows her reality role as wild child and Paris Hilton's best friend in The Simple Life.
The Tina-Fey production tells the story of a New Jersey mum who works at her daughter's workplace.
Great News will air April 25 on NBC.
